attributes.action: Stop funding/supporting Israel in any sorts.
attributes.additional_details: I want you to stop funding Israel because I believe the money supports actions that are unjust, such as the treatment of Palestinians and the expansion of settlements. It feels unfair for taxpayer money to be used for this purpose when there are pressing issues that need attention at home. Supporting this funding seems to prolong conflict rather than promote peace.
attributes.background: Stop funding Israel because the money supports actions that harm Palestinians and expand settlements. It takes resources away from pressing issues at home and instead, funds a genocide.

rejection.details:
The UK does not provide financial aid to Israel in the way implied by this petition. It does issue arms export licenses, an issue covered by the following petition which you may wish to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700918
